titleStmt.title: A declaration on His Highness the Lord Protector and the Parlament of the Common-wealth of England, Scotland, & Ireland, for a day of solemn fasting & humiliation in the three nations.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by William du-Gard and Henry Hills, printers to His Highness the Lord Protector,
